Posts.EditableText:
Since, my previous post got closed (I guess editing a post in the thread doesn't count as activity), had to create a new update post.

Updated the game to V9, bringing a variety of new improvements, quality of life changes, and a brand new tutorial!

Enjoy. Link = http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/rvnjlvi4heq6u7-namkaxa/the-cataclysm-of-chaos-v9

EDIT1: Released Hotfix 1.
